snippet: Singer Trey Songz has declined to accept an offer that would have reduced a felony assault charge stemming from a concert appearance in Detroit to a misdemeanor....

headline.main: Red Sox Say Price Will Not Need Arm Surgery or Injection
headline.print_headline: Red Sox Say Price Will Not Need Arm Surgery or Injection

lead_paragraph: Singer Trey Songz has declined to accept an offer that would have reduced a felony assault charge stemming from a concert appearance in Detroit to a misdemeanor.
